title: HAP 16 - Samuel Imbo on Okot p'Bitek and Oral Traditions
itunes:title: HAP 16 - Samuel Imbo on Okot p'Bitek and Oral Traditions
description: A conversation with Sam Imbo on approaching oral traditions as philosophy and the Ugandan thinker and poet Okot p'Bitek.
